statements: SELECT * FROM telemetry_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT mission_id, timestamp, telemetry_value, telemetry_type FROM telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT mission_id, telemetry_type FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_value > 100 ORDER BY telemetry_value ASC;
SELECT telemetry_type, AVG(telemetry_value) AS avg_value FROM telemetry_data GROUP BY telemetry_type;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT mission_id, telemetry_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY telemetry_value ASC
SELECT mission_id, AVG(telemetry_value) AS average_value FROM telemetry_data GROUP BY mission_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY average_value DESC
SELECT DISTINCT telemetry_type FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_value > 100
SELECT mission_id, timestamp FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_type IN ('temperature', 'humidity')
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT telemetry_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_id = 123
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM mission_details
SELECT mission_name, arrival_date FROM mission_details WHERE mission_id = 456
SELECT mission_id, telemetry_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT mission_id, telemetry_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE mission_id = 5 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31'
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM mission_details WHERE launch_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date ASC
SELECT t.mission_id, t.timestamp, t.telemetry_value, m.mission_name FROM telemetry_data t JOIN mission_details m ON t.mission_id = m.mission_id
SELECT AVG(telemetry_value) AS avg_value, DAY(timestamp) AS observation_day FROM telemetry_data GROUP BY DAY(timestamp) ORDER BY observation_day ASC
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, timestamp, data_type FROM telemetry_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE data_value > 100.0;
SELECT * FROM mission_status WHERE status_description LIKE '%success%';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, mission_duration FROM mission_details WHERE mission_duration < 365;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT mission_name, data_type, data_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY data_value ASC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, landing_date, mission_duration FROM mission_details WHERE mission_duration > 200 ORDER BY launch_date DESC;

SELECT mission_name, status_description, reporting_date FROM mission_status JOIN mission_details ON mission_status.mission_id = mission_details.mission_id WHERE status_code = 200 ORDER BY reporting_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE data_type = 'pressure';
SELECT * FROM mission;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM mission WHERE mission_status='Completed';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM mission WHERE launch_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM spacecraft ORDER BY spacecraft_name DESC;
SELECT mission_id, COUNT(astronaut_id) AS total_crew_members FROM mission_crew GROUP BY mission_id HAVING total_crew_members > 3;
SELECT * FROM mission;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name FROM mission WHERE mission_status = 'Completed';
SELECT mission_id, telemetry_timestamp, telemetry_data->>'temperature' AS temperature FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_data->>'temperature' > '30';
SELECT * FROM spacecraft ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_id, astronaut_id, role FROM mission_crew WHERE role = 'Commander';
SELECT * FROM missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM missions WHERE mission_status='Active';
SELECT MAX(launch_date) AS latest_launch FROM missions;
SELECT m.mission_name, t.telemetry_value, t.telemetry_timestamp FROM missions m JOIN telemetry_data t ON m.mission_id = t.mission_id;
SELECT s.spacecraft_name, s.spacecraft_type, m.mission_name FROM spacecraft s JOIN missions m ON s.mission_id = m.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM missions WHERE mission_status = 'Active';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT spacecraft_name, spacecraft_type FROM spacecraft WHERE mission_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM mission_members WHERE mission_id = '98765432-9876-5432-9876-543298765432';
SELECT telemetry_timestamp, telemetry_value FROM telemetry_data WHERE telemetry_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY telemetry_timestamp ASC;
